messages.subject: Re: [SHQ] Re: Shinsengumi cosplay ~ Aizu fall festival
messages.msgSnippet: hey..hey.hey.. Thx for sharing. Seems very fun. kikue.mugen  wrote: If I could get my butt over to Japan, I d probably end up on the
messages.messageBody:
hey..hey.hey..
Thx for sharing.
Seems very fun.

"kikue.mugen" <kikue.mugen@...> wrote:
If I could get my butt over to Japan, I'd probably end up on the Japan
News being a crazy person who camped out day and night in front of
Fujita's grave for the entire month's vacation.

It is only obvious that the guy wearing the glasses might honor Fujita-
sama in his life 'almost' as much as I do. The more people like that,
the better in my humble opinion!

Go! Go! Guy wearing the glasses! *cheers*

messages.msgSnippet: If I could get my butt over to Japan, I d probably end up on the Japan News being a crazy person who camped out day and night in front of Fujita s grave for
messages.messageBody:
If I could get my butt over to Japan, I'd probably end up on the Japan
News being a crazy person who camped out day and night in front of
Fujita's grave for the entire month's vacation.

It is only obvious that the guy wearing the glasses might honor Fujita-
sama in his life 'almost' as much as I do. The more people like that,
the better in my humble opinion!

Go! Go! Guy wearing the glasses! *cheers*
